comment: * Exception thrown by the service when the HTTP failure response that caused the API to fail * contains a Retry-After header. * * @hide

methods.name: public void setRetryAfterToValidDuration(long defaultDuration, long maxDuration)
methods.comment:
* If {@link #mRetryAfter} < {@code defaultDuration}, it gets set to {@code defaultDuration}. If
     * {@link #mRetryAfter} > {@code maxDuration}, it gets set to {@code maxDuration}. If it falls
     * in the range of both numbers, it stays the same.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public Duration getRetryAfter()
methods.comment:
* @return the positive retry-after {@link Duration} if set or else {@link Duration#ZERO} by
     *     default.

methodNames: public void setRetryAfterToValidDuration(long defaultDuration, long maxDuration)
